name: Survive the Heist
description:
Survive the Heist

This is a LD 44 entry. This game is an interactive story where you have to survive a bank heist. Will you unlock the 4 endings ?

Controls

Movement : WASD / Arrows

Interact : E

Next dialog : Space

Credits
  • Elinks : Programming, Game Design
  • Meibo : Programming, Story, Sound Design, Game Design
  • NaughtyPingouin : Map Art, Game Design
  • Ashtrail : Portait Art, Dialogues, Programming, Story, Game Design
